channel.title: Need help with making preaching god books like rs

item.title: Need help with making preaching god books like rs
item.dc:creator: @runescapeddsk0 runescapeddsk0
item.description:
@runescapeddsk0 wrote:

this is my code:

[code]case 16: // Alternative Item Option 2

int item_id = inStream.readSignedWordA();

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Pimp”))
{
System.out.println("Item id: "+item_id);
}

checkwildy();

if (item_id == 4079) { // Yo-Yo (Walk)
startAnimation(1459);
}

if (item_id == 3840 || item_id == 3842 || item_id == 3844 )
{
if(teleblock)
{
sendMessage(“You are currently teleblocked and cannot tele n00blet”);
}
else if (!teleblock)
{
teleportToX = 3660;
teleportToY = 3515;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the ectofuntus prayer training area.”);
}
}

break;[/code]
how do i make the books say something instead of teleing me to the prayer training arena?im using runescape3

Read full topic
